author: Kevin Luo
description: Kevin’s inspiration: “My inspiration came from the food waste in the kitchen, things that get thrown away because they are the wrong shape or size could be used to make a delicious cocktail.The core value of my cocktail is ‘sustainability and infinity’ - showing respect to those who strive to protect the environment. 8verlast is a cocktail that combines locally sourced ingredients and innovation because we should never stop inventing new ways to use ingredients.”
name: 8verlast

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
